mapper.select: select r.id, r.scheme_price_id, r.fit_area, r.scheme_name, r.staging_number_id, r.deposit, r.monthly_rent, r.interest_gross_profit, r.create_time, r.update_time, r.create_by, r.update_by, r.is_enable, r.sort, r.staging_number, r.staging_number_type, case when r.staging_number_type=1 then d.value else r.staging_number end "stagingNumberName" from lease_scheme_price_rent r left join lease_dict d on r.staging_number_id=d.id where r.scheme_price_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into lease_scheme_price_rent (id, scheme_price_id, fit_area, scheme_name, staging_number_id, deposit, monthly_rent, interest_gross_profit, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, is_enable, sort,staging_number,staging_number_type) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{schemePriceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fitArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schemeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stagingNumberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deposit,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{monthlyRent,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{int erestGrossProfit,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isEnable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{stagingNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{stagingNumberType,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update lease_scheme_price_rent

fit_area = #{fitArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
